Considering how popular shit like dubstep rap(I'm not really a fan of rap anymore cause my old roommate would never stop fucking playing that crap) and such are popular if there is ever a kids show about rap chances are your fears will be realized cause I wouldn't be surprised if the show is complete shit.

I don't mind rap and actually like it when it's done well, but christ do I agree with you on this that rap is so easy to ruin.  I have a feeling that if there ever is a children's tv show about rap chances are it's going to be cringeworthy.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546e496e636872329f060100#post_546e496e636872329f060100
As much as I love Vocaloid's, it really wouldn't work as an anime, because Miku and all Vocaloids  have no truly established character. The only choice a studio would have is to make it the most generic thing ever. And I don't want that. Although I've heard good things about the Black Rock Shooter OVA and I like the Mozaik Role manga.

!http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/642/656/78a.gif!


Joking aside do you ever feel like we're two sides of the same coin?  Like we both enjoy shipping characters of the same franchises; often the same franchises we enjoy; we like the same sorts of things kink wise(I'm still more perverted, but I will give it to you that you get more sex[living in a area of texas where all the dude's are so far in the closet that they found narnia sucks(rimshot[recursive rimshot])]), *BUT* where you like yaoi I like yuri and such.
